message: Hello Bob, thank you for your interest in my product. I'm confident it will be highly valuable to you.  To start the negotiation, I'm offering it at $1,000,000.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $700,000 for it, which is the maximum I'm willing to go.
Bob, I understand your position, but I believe my initial offer is closer to the true value of this product.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $925,000.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $925,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $700,000 and $925,000, so I'm offering $812,500 for the product.
